Package com.example.omrifit.adapters

Class MediaAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder>
com.example.omrifit.adapters.MediaAdapter
public class MediaAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder>
RecyclerView Adapter for displaying a list of MediaItem objects (images and videos).

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    MediaAdapter.ImageViewHolder
    ViewHolder class for holding the view elements of each item for images.
    static interface 
    MediaAdapter.LikedStatusListener
    Interface for checking liked status of a media item.
    static class 
    MediaAdapter.VideoViewHolder
    ViewHolder class for holding the view elements of each item for videos.

    • MediaAdapter

      Constructor for MediaAdapter.
      Parameters:
      context - The context of the calling activity.
      mediaList - The list of MediaItem objects to be displayed.
      isme - Boolean indicating if the current user is the owner of the media.
      anotherId - The ID of another user.
